future_epoch_time_write().details: Emits Write event to prevent from being a view function

mint(address,uint256).details: Requires this contract to be funded with the reward token

params._account: The address to receive the reward tokens
params._amount: The amount of tokens to send the receiver

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._rate: The rate of reward token emissions

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

available_supply().notice: Returns the amount of reward tokens on this contract

mint(address,uint256).notice: Mints the given amount to the given account

setMinter(address).notice: Sets the address of the minter contract
